excerpt: "Whether you’re receiving financial advice via a banking app, shopping online or troubleshooting computer problems with tech support, AI is likely to play a part in your daily activities. Indeed, 50 per cent of respondents to McKinsey’s State of AI 2020 survey reported that their companies have adopted the technology in at least one business function."
